Selected Answer: C

C. Examine a list of process executions with a specific hash to determine the earliest execution time.

questions.question_text: To best determine the root cause of an enterprise wide infection you would:

choices.A: Examine a list of processes by hash to determine the latest execution time and last infected machine.
choices.C: Examine a list of process executions with a specific hash to determine the earliest execution time.
choices.D: Examine a list of outbound network connections on non-standard ports to identify suspicious processes.
choices.B: Perform frequency analysis to identify outlier processes that should not be running in your environment.
